wikipedia_page.main: Sam Thomson (born 23 January 1994) is a Scottish rugby union player. He currently plays in Japan for Toshiba Brave Lupus in the Top League competition. His usual position is at lock.

response: *Sam Thomson (rugby union) (born 1994), Scottish rugby union player
